
``nnDT_to_kNN``
===================

nnDT_to_kNN

Description
-----------

Convert a nearest network data.table to a kNN object

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   nnDT_to_kNN(nnDT)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``nnDT``
     - nearest neighbor network in data.table format


Value
-----

kNN object
